messages.title: An Honest, Fair Approach
messages.content: I will argue for a fairer economic strategy, whilst pushing for evolving standards in our schools. The biggest local issue for so many in Vauxhall continues to be housing.

messages.title: An Honest, Independent Voice for Vauxhall
messages.content: Keeping Vauxhall's voice heard and strong, standing up to the powerful and helping the less fortunate, fighting for the rights of tenants and homeowners.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Argue for a fairer economic strategy.
Push for evolving standards in schools.
Continues to support tenants getting a fair deal from Lambeth Housing Associations, as well as leaseholders whose service charges don't reflect value for money.

issues.brexitEurope: I still believe that the EU harms our sovereignty and distracts our global focus.
issues.socialWelfare: Discuss the importance of support networks for the poor and elderly.

housing.content: The biggest local issue for so many in Vauxhall continues to be housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am proud to represent St. Thomas' Hospital and look towards a 'Labour Government reversing the Coalition's NHS reforms'.

politicalExperience.achievements: Challenging party whips and advocating for constituents.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Emphasizes honesty and independent thought, and the pamphlet includes a handwritten signature.
